originalText.text: Love this salon! Been coming here for years and even when I moved from the neighborhood, I still come back! Dominik is so attentive & listens to what you what and delivers it time & time again. Truly a salon that cares not only how your hair will turn out, but cares for the overall health of your hair. Dominik has been turning my hair into gold & kept its integrity. It has grown long & healthy since I‚Äôve been seeing him. Highly recommend!

text.text: Love this salon! Been coming here for years and even when I moved from the neighborhood, I still come back! Dominik is so attentive & listens to what you what and delivers it time & time again. Truly a salon that cares not only how your hair will turn out, but cares for the overall health of your hair. Dominik has been turning my hair into gold & kept its integrity. It has grown long & healthy since I‚Äôve been seeing him. Highly recommend!

originalText.text:
Love everything about this salon! Edwin has done amazing work with coloring and cutting my naturally curly hair. Ive loved my balayage and it grew out beautifully with minimal maintenance. I‚Äôve been to a variety of salons, even some that specialize with natural curls. But Edwin truly does it better than anyone I‚Äôd been to in the past. He and Dominik are such experts in what they do. Edwin seems to try many items on the market and is able to guide me in what products may work best for my hair.

But my favorite thing about this place is just how uplifting they are! In the past I dreaded salon experiences due to general negativity, stylists being critical of hair maintenance, and poor results on top of it. When I come to The Club, I know I can relax. Each time I have left feeling totally accepted and built up, and with great hair on top of it! Would recommend to any and all family and friends!

thanks Edwin!!
xx

originalText.text:
Although Guadalupe was very kind, she absolutely destroyed my curly hair.

I have curly hair, and I asked about doing a dry cut. I know my hair shrinks a ton and a lot of the times it‚Äôs easier to see the curl pattern take shape when it‚Äôs dry.

I explained what I wanted to my stylist, came with pictures, I thought we were on the same page. But then we started cutting my hair wet. My end result was no where NEAR what I originally wanted and much much too short. Now I‚Äôm ashamed to wear my curls, with this ‚ÄúKaren‚Äù cut I have now. Razor cutting curly hair??? My curls will never clump the same. Thanks girl.

If you‚Äôre a curly girl who wants to go natural, maybe look somewhere that is trained in dry cuts.
